blogposts.author: William Shatner
blogposts.content: Failed SAT. Lost scholarship. Invented rocket.

blogposts.author: Eileen Gunn
blogposts.content: Computer, did we bring batteries? Computer?

blogposts.author: David Brin
blogposts.content: Vacuum collision. Orbits diverge. Farewell, love.

blogposts.author: Joss Whedon
blogposts.content: Gown removed carelessly. Head, less so.

blogposts.author: Stan Lee
blogposts.content: Automobile warranty expires. So does engine.

blogposts.author: Alan Moore
blogposts.content: Machine. Unexpectedly, I’d invented a time

blogposts.author: Margaret Atwood
blogposts.content: Longed for him. Got him. Shit.

blogposts.author: Rudy Rucker
blogposts.content: His penis snapped off; he’s pregnant!

blogposts.author: Gregory Maguire
blogposts.content: From torched skyscrapers, men grew wings.

blogposts.author: Frank Miller
blogposts.content: With bloody hands, I say good-bye.

blogposts.author: Steven Meretzky
blogposts.content: Wasted day. Wasted life. Dessert, please.

blogposts.author: Vernor Vinge
blogposts.content: Epitaph: Foolish humans, never escaped Earth.

blogposts.author: Bruce Sterling
blogposts.content: It cost too much, staying human.

blogposts.author: James Patrick Kelly
blogposts.content: We kissed. She melted. Mop please!
